title: What is the kinetic energy of a satellite

content.prompt: What is the kinetic energy of a satellite of mass m in that orbits the Earth, of mass M, in a circular orbit of radius R ?

choices.label: 1 2 G M m R MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3CE3@

1 2   G M m R 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3FD6@

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems
